name: Roman Board Game
description:
What you think about to play a Roman Board Game, check this board game to you play with your friends and have great fun

Latrunculi (also called Ludus Latrunculorum) was played in Ancient Rome. The name of the game comes from the Latin word for a hired mercenary. The oldest known source for this game was Varro, who lived from 116 to 27 BC, although the game most likely existed before his time
